ygData.subject: New items in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Weird things have been going on in Kithicor since the Plane of Hate opened this weekend (at least on Brell Serilis). There are many high-level undead creatures
ygData.messageBody:
Weird things have been going on in Kithicor since the Plane of Hate opened
this weekend (at least on Brell Serilis). There are many high-level undead
creatures (30+ skels) roaming there at night now from what I hear. Also,
they seem to be dropping some pretty decent items for Clerics. Here are 2
that a friend of mine has found already:

Tainted Teir'Dal Great Staff
MAGIC NODROP
Damage 16, Delay 42, Weight 7.5
+3 WIS, +3 INT, -5 Disease
WAR, CLR, SHD, DRU, MNK, SHM, NEC, WIZ, MAG, ENC
ALL

Tainted Battleworn Morning Star
MAGIC NODROP
Damage 7, Delay 30, Weight 9.0
+6 WIS, -5 Disease
WAR, CLR, PAL, RNG, SHD, DRU, MNK, BRD, ROG, SHM
ALL

I haven't been to Kithicor since PoH opened, but I am excited to see some
more action in an otherwise dead zone. Good thing I got Turgan's Note and
the Ingot before they added all the baddies ;)

Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
Oblivion Knight of the 26th Circle
